title: "eKlima stations"
output: html_document
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
active <- read_delim("data/eKlima/windstationsEklima.txt", delim = ";")
metastations <- read_delim("data/eKlima/metastations_troms.txt", delim = ";") %>% 
  select(Stnr:Name, Utm_e:Utm_zone)
windstations <- active %>%
  left_join(metastations, by="Stnr")
```
